import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

Batch commands allow you to change multiple [Workflow Executions](/workflows#workflow-execution) <span id="i-e9758cf7-7735-46cc-85b9-9c89abeb14ae" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-e9758cf7-7735-46cc-85b9-9c89abeb14ae" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-e9758cf7-7735-46cc-85b9-9c89abeb14ae" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Execution?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Temporal Workflow Execution is a durable, scalable, reliable, and reactive function execution. It is the main unit of execution of a Temporal Application.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> in the background.
In order to do this, you provide the command with a [List Filter](/visibility#list-filter) <span id="i-f5986462-eddd-4819-9c89-ce752ed1276a" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-f5986462-eddd-4819-9c89-ce752ed1276a" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-f5986462-eddd-4819-9c89-ce752ed1276a" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a List Filter?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A List Filter is the SQL-like string that is provided as the parameter to an advanced Visibility List API.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">filtered-lists</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">visibility</span></div></div> and the type of Batch job to execute.

The List Filter identifies the Workflow Executions that will be affected by the Batch job.
The Batch type determines the other parameters that need to be provided, along with what is being affected on the Workflow Executions.

There are three types of Batch Jobs:

- Signal: sends a [Signal](/workflows#signal) <span id="i-346ad1b2-ce78-4eb6-933e-31a299b00f57" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-346ad1b2-ce78-4eb6-933e-31a299b00f57" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-346ad1b2-ce78-4eb6-933e-31a299b00f57" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Signal?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Signal is an asynchronous request to a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">signals</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> to the Workflow Executions specified by the List Filter.
- Cancel: cancels the Workflow Executions specified by the List Filter.
- Terminate: terminates the Workflow Executions specified by the List Filter.

A successfully started Batch job will return a Job ID.
Use this Job ID to execute other actions on the Batch job.

## list

When used, `temporal batch list` returns all Batch jobs.
Batch Jobs can be returned for an entire Cluster or a single Namespace.
`temporal batch list --namespace=MyNamespace`

Use the command options listed below to change the information returned by this command.

- [--fields](/cli/cmd-options#fields) <span id="i-ebf5a3a0-fb4d-4876-a2cf-b93c9a11c42d" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-ebf5a3a0-fb4d-4876-a2cf-b93c9a11c42d" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-ebf5a3a0-fb4d-4876-a2cf-b93c9a11c42d" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal fields</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Customize fields to print.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">temporal cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">options-feature</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">command-line-interface-cli</span></div></div>

- [--limit](/cli/cmd-options#limit) <span id="i-735b77d7-5d07-4b2a-9d00-5eddc461e98b" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-735b77d7-5d07-4b2a-9d00-5eddc461e98b" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-735b77d7-5d07-4b2a-9d00-5eddc461e98b" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal limit</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Number of items to print.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">temporal cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">options-feature</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">command-line-interface-cli</span></div></div>

- [--output](/cli/cmd-options#output) <span id="i-734ec1bd-c967-4adb-b4cf-f88ddf0bf446" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-734ec1bd-c967-4adb-b4cf-f88ddf0bf446" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-734ec1bd-c967-4adb-b4cf-f88ddf0bf446" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal output</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Output format.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">temporal cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">options-feature</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">command-line-interface-cli</span></div></div>

- [--pager](/cli/cmd-options#pager) <span id="i-78a8d310-994b-4249-9f25-9646f8b68df1" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-78a8d310-994b-4249-9f25-9646f8b68df1" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-78a8d310-994b-4249-9f25-9646f8b68df1" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal pager</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Sets the pager for Temporal CLI to use.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">temporal cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">options-feature</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">command-line-interface-cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">pager</span></div></div>

## describe

The `temporal batch describe` command shows the progress of an ongoing Batch job.

Pass a valid Job ID to return a Batch Job's information.
`temporal batch describe --jobid=MyJobId`

Use the command options listed below to change the information returned by this command.

- [--fields](/cli/cmd-options#fields) <span id="i-8a9a5ed0-6f64-44c3-a722-e2abb8f2e5b5" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-8a9a5ed0-6f64-44c3-a722-e2abb8f2e5b5" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-8a9a5ed0-6f64-44c3-a722-e2abb8f2e5b5" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal fields</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Customize fields to print.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">temporal cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">options-feature</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">command-line-interface-cli</span></div></div>

- [--job-id](/cli/cmd-options#job-id) <span id="i-507a0b33-2673-4d05-ab22-1285ff2aafe1" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-507a0b33-2673-4d05-ab22-1285ff2aafe1" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-507a0b33-2673-4d05-ab22-1285ff2aafe1" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal job-id</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Batch Job Id</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">temporal cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">options-feature</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">command-line-interface-cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">batch job</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">job id</span></div></div>

## terminate

The `temporal batch terminate` command terminates a Batch job with the provided Job ID.
A reason for terminating the Batch Job can also be provided for future reference.

`temporal batch terminate --job-id=MyJobId --reason=JobReason`

Use the command options listed below to change the behavior of this command.

- [--fields](/cli/cmd-options#fields) <span id="i-919bd1d8-692b-4cb9-8bde-16d9ac868bdf" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-919bd1d8-692b-4cb9-8bde-16d9ac868bdf" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-919bd1d8-692b-4cb9-8bde-16d9ac868bdf" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal fields</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Customize fields to print.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">temporal cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">options-feature</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">command-line-interface-cli</span></div></div>

- [--job-id](/cli/cmd-options#job-id) <span id="i-1e6c05af-8167-4253-b78c-343193862899" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-1e6c05af-8167-4253-b78c-343193862899" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-1e6c05af-8167-4253-b78c-343193862899" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal job-id</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Batch Job Id</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">temporal cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">options-feature</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">command-line-interface-cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">batch job</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">job id</span></div></div>

- [--limit](/cli/cmd-options#limit) <span id="i-9c9043c5-8b95-45eb-aee8-a15f370231a5" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-9c9043c5-8b95-45eb-aee8-a15f370231a5" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-9c9043c5-8b95-45eb-aee8-a15f370231a5" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal limit</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Number of items to print.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">temporal cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">options-feature</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">command-line-interface-cli</span></div></div>

- [--time-format](/cli/cmd-options#time-format) <span id="i-f0befd32-6ad4-453e-8ee9-d683c1c5c583" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-f0befd32-6ad4-453e-8ee9-d683c1c5c583" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-f0befd32-6ad4-453e-8ee9-d683c1c5c583" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal time-format</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Format time as either relative, iso, raw.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">temporal cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">options-feature</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">command-line-interface-cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">time</span></div></div>
